title: Print NOD for a MN league Release tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN Users have permission to Print from the form will see a "Print" button on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks print on the tx in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a menu will open where the user can choose to print a Notice of Disposition. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The English pdf will follow the English Notice of Disposition format.
AND The Spanish pdf will follow the Spanish Notice of Disposition format.

title: As a user I want to be able to print an Advance Consent letter for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has permission to print
AND is on a Pro Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Create New>Player Letters> Advance Consent
custom_expected:
THEN PDF will generate in correct language version
AND populate Date/Name/Club with default values (can be changed by user)

title: UAT Feedback - Update minor league service rule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating transfer tx
AND the player has exceeded service restrictions
custom_expected:
THEN user receives error: Player exceeds service restrictions. See MLR 51. Contact BOC to submit transaction.
AND Message #31 should be always be a hard error for Clubs and only overrideable for BOC.

title: UAT Feedback - As a user I want to see Released and Free Agent players with a Roster Level of N/A
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a pro player profile for a Released or FA player
custom_expected:
THEN The "Roster Level" field on the pro player profile reads N/A for players that are not currently actually on a roster of any kind (Released and Free Agents). 
AND The "Roster Level" continues to read 40-Man or Non 40-Man for MJ and MN league players.

title: UAT Feedback - Update date check rule to be 2 business days vs. 3 business days
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has back/future dated a tx 2 or more days
custom_expected:
THEN This rule should be changed from 3 business days to 2 business days. 
AND The error message should be updated accordingly.

title: As a user I want to receive a warning if the player I'm creating a major/minor outright transaction for has any active or unexpired waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating a mj/mn outright tx for a player that has any active/unexpired waivers
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired) will check if the player has any Active or unexpired waivers. If yes, then a warning will be shown.
custom_expected:
THEN error: "Player is on a pending waiver request bulletin."
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction.

title: As a user I want approving an Elect Free Agency transaction to update the player's waiver information
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a preliminary elect FA tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the Elect Free Agency transaction is approved the following values are set: 
* Set the player Optional waivers flag to 0
* Set the players Option waivers effective date to null
* Set the players Outright waivers flag to 0
* Set the players Outright waivers effective date to null
* Set the players Trade waivers flag to 0
* Set the players Trade waivers effective date to null
custom_expected:
THEN On reverse:
* Set the players Optional waivers flag back to its previous value.
* Set the players Option waivers effective date back to its previous value.
* Set the players Outright waivers flag back to its previous value.
* Set the players Outright waivers effective date back to its previous value.
* Set the players Trade waivers flag back to its previous value.
* Set the players Trade waivers effective date back to its previous value.

title: As a user I want to receive an error if I am attempting to designate a Not Yet Reported player with a recent waiver claim assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is designating a NOT Yet Reported player w/a recent waiver claim
custom_steps: WHEN Rule checked on "Submit" and "Approve".  If the players major league roster status is Not yet Reported, then there must be no waiver claim assignment with a transaction date within three days (including today) after the waiver claim assignments Placement date. If there is then display an error.
custom_expected:
THEN show error: "Please contact the Commissioners Office."
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue (BOC Only) will ignore the warning and continue with the transaction. 
AND Users will also have back option. Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.

title: As a user I want to see if an optional assignment completes a 26th man process
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating an optional assignment for a 26th man
custom_expected: THEN Reinstate from DL or Reinstate from IL with 26th man appointment checkbox checked within last 2 days (today and back 2 days), then description on the player's history should append â€œ(completes the 26th Man process)â€￾.

title: As a BOC user I want approving a sign Free Agent roster transaction to update the player's information
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a sign to MJ league roster tx
custom_steps:
WHEN Approving a sign to major league roster transaction will make the following updates to a player's information:
IF playerâ€™s rookie flag is not set and the rookie milestone date is not set, then set the playerâ€™s rookie flag.
IF player was an employee, set employee flag to 0 set MJ player status to â€˜Pâ€™ (professional).
AND Set playerâ€™s current MJ league acquisition org
AND Set playerâ€™s current MJ league acquisition date
AND Set club acquired from to null
IF 1st MJ acquisition org is null, set 1st MJ acquisition org
IF 1st MJ acquisition date is null, set 1st MJ acquisition date
AND Add the Org logo to his player profile
IF Player was a 10/5 and he is re-signing with the same Org, then restore his 10/5 info from prior to his Free Agency.
custom_expected:
THEN Reversing the tx sets the playerâ€™s info to the prior values based on transaction history:
IF player was an employee, set employee flag to and  MJ player status to value in history prior to transaction approval.
AND Set playerâ€™s current MJ league acquisition org to value in history prior to transaction approval.
AND Set playerâ€™s current MJ league acquisition date to value in history prior to transaction approval.
AND Set club acquired from to value in history prior to transaction approval.
IF 1st MJ acquisition org was set by transaction, set 1st MJ acquisition org to value in history prior to transaction approval.
IF 1st MJ acquisition date was set by transaction, set 1st MJ acquisition date to value in history prior to transaction approval.
IF rookie flag  and rookie milestone date was set by transaction, set these to value in history prior to transaction approval.
AND Change Org logo to value in history prior to transaction approval.
IF player's 10/5 information was updated, set this to the value in history prior to transaction approval.

title: As a user I want approving an Elect Free Agency transaction to update player information
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a Elect FA tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the transaction is approved:
Logo on player's profile reverts to MLB logo
AND Set the playerâ€™s uniform number to null - should display on profile as blank.
AND Set the playerâ€™s current major league club report date to null.
AND Set the playerâ€™s current club acquired from to null.
AND Set the playerâ€™s current major league acquisition org to null. 
AND Set the playerâ€™s current major league acquisition date to null.
AND Set the playerâ€™s ten/five player date to null.
AND Set the playerâ€™s ten/five player flag to 0.
custom_expected:
THEN When the transaction is reversed:
Set the logo on player's profile back to its previous value.
AND Set the playerâ€™s uniform number back to its previous value. 
AND Set the playerâ€™s current major league club report date back to its previous value.
AND Set the playerâ€™s current club acquired from back to its previous value.
AND Set the playerâ€™s current major league acquisition org back to its previous value. 
AND Set the playerâ€™s current major league acquisition date back to its previous value.
AND Set the playerâ€™s ten/five player date back to its previous value.
AND Set the playerâ€™s ten/five player flag back to its previous value.

title: As an LRD user I want to receive a notification if a Sign to MJ Roster transaction is approved for a player re-signing with the same Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating a Sign to MJ League Roster tx for a player w/the same org
custom_steps: WHEN a Sign to MJ League Roster transaction is approved for a 10/5 player that is re-signing with the Org that he elected free agency from most recently, a notification is generated for LRD.
custom_expected:
THEN Description of the notification will read "Previous 10/5 player re-signing with same Org"
AND Clicking the notification will open the Sign Free Agent transaction. 
AND Clicking the player's name on the notification will open the player's player history tab of their profile.
